channel.title: Budding producers!
channel.description:
Finally getting around to doing some youtube videos on production... yes I've been saying I will do that for months, stfu Sensored. (<3)
If anyone has anything they'd wanna see a tutorial on, or are confused about or whatever, please post here it would be helpful to me etc

item.title: Budding producers!
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

The idea is to keep most of it as generic as possible so it can be applied to any program, but I will be doing a couple of vids on stuff specific to Cubase and FL Studio. I’ve used pretty much every sequencer there is at some point, so if you want one on a different program, ask and I’ll see what I can do

Read full topic

item.title: Budding producers!
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

What program will you be doing tuts/tips on?

Read full topic

item.title: Budding producers!
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

I think the best idea would be to do things in order. Start off with basic, and then get more and more advanced, building on each tutorial.

Also, people’s video comments would probably include suggestions.

Read full topic
